code: import React,{useRef,useEffect}from'react';import{useDispatch,useSelector}from'react-redux';import{TextInput,Row}from'react-materialize';import{filterLocations,clearFilter}from'../../actions/location';var LocationFilter=function LocationFilter(){var filtered=useSelector(function(state){return state.location.filtered;});var text=useRef('');var dispatch=useDispatch();useEffect(function(){if(!filtered){text.current.value='';}});var onChange=function onChange(e){if(text.current.value!==''){dispatch(filterLocations(e.target.value));}else{dispatch(clearFilter());}};return/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(Row,{className:"row-grid filter"},/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(TextInput,{ref:text,placeholder:"Filter",onChange:onChange}));};export default LocationFilter;
